Bug_report.Title: Page "TradingView" is not translated into all languages except DE, ES
Bug_report.Steps: 1.Navigate to capital.com 2.Select any language (except AR, DE) 3.Tap on button [Burger menu] 4.Expand menu section [Ways to trade] 5.Tap on menu item [TradingView]"
Bug_report.Expected_result: Block "TradingView" is translated into all languages
Bug_report.Actual_result: Block "TradingView" is not translated into all languages except DE
